author: Jean Lee, Jean Lee
title: Coronavirus: Fox News hosts self-isolating amid contact fears - despite network playing down risks for weeks
description: As the coronavirus death toll rises, the virus reaches those skeptical of its severity
content:
Fox Business presenter Liz Claman had revealed that she is self-quarantining after coming into contact with a colleague who has tested positive for Covid-19.
The 56-year-old made a brief appearance on her show, Claman Countdown, on Monday afternoon to tell v… [+3875 chars]
